ground_truth: There are two ways to get from $A$ to $B$, and there are two ways to get from $B$ to $C$: this gives four paths. Alternately, we could bypass $B$ entirely and move straight from $A$ to $C$: there is one such path. Thus, there are $\boxed{5}$ different paths.
